<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform">
    <sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <acl_failure_result/>
        <api_name>x_58872_needit.Add User to Text String</api_name>
        <description>This Transform Data Resource constructs a string using the format <user_full_name>'s Next NeedIt
</description>
        <mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data>
        <name>Add User to Text String</name>
        <output_schema/>
        <private>false</private>
        <props>[
  {
    "name":"userFullName",
    "label":"User full name",
    "description":"",
    "readOnly":"false",
    "fieldType":"string",
    "mandatory":true,
    "defaultValue":""
  }
]</props>
        <required_translations>[ {
  "message" : "User full name",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations>
        <schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version>
        <script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
  
  // Concatenate the user name from the Data Resource Configuration
  // with a string
    var newString = input.userFullName + "'s Next NeedIt";
    return newString;
  
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name>
